sentences.english: His father could not meet his bills.
Your store bill is too high, we just can't finance you any longer.
sentences.chinese: 你在店裏的欠賬太多，我們再也不會讓你賒賬了。

sentences.english: He pays off what others owe.
sentences.chinese: 欠賬的是別人，還錢的卻是他。

sentences.english: I have to pay off this score before spending any more money.
sentences.chinese: 我得把這筆欠賬付清之後才能再花錢。

sentences.english: The issue of bond should quit from competitive and profitable program, apply to remunerate to historical debt for workers in state-owned enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 國家應當用國債償還欠國有企業職工的歷史欠賬。
